spells.name: Shield
spells.basic_level: One friendly target unit receives 15% less damage from Hand-to-hand combat
spells.advanced_level: One friendly target unit receives 30% less damage from Hand-to-hand combat
spells.expert_level: All friendly units' receive 30% less damage from Hand-to-hand combat

spells.name: Slow
spells.basic_level: One enemy target's speed is reduced to 25% of normal
spells.advanced_level: One enemy target's speed is reduced to 50% of normal
spells.expert_level: All enemy units' speed are reduced to 50% of normal

spells.name: Stone skin
spells.basic_level: One friendly target's defense rating is increased by three
spells.advanced_level: One friendly target's defense rating is increased by six
spells.expert_level: All friendly targets' defense rating are increased by six

spells.name: View Earth
spells.basic_level: Displays the location of all loose resources on the view world screen
spells.advanced_level: Displays the location of all mines and loose resources on the view world screen
spells.expert_level: Displays the entire terrain, all mines and loose resources on the view world screen

spells.name: Death Ripple
spells.basic_level: All non-undead troops take ((Power x 5) + 10) damage
spells.advanced_level: All non-undead troops take ((Power x 5) + 20) damage
spells.expert_level: All non-undead troops take ((Power x 5) + 30) damage

spells.name: Quicksand
spells.basic_level: Quicksand pits are placed in four random hexes. They are invisible to creatures unless they are on native terrain. Troops stepping on pit hexes have their movement halted for the current round. Once a pit is stepped on, it is revealed to all
spells.advanced_level: Same as Basic effect, except that six pits are placed
spells.expert_level: Same as Basic efect, except that eight pits are placed

spells.name: Animate Dead
spells.basic_level: Reanimates ((Power x 50) + 30) health points worth of killed undead creatures in target, allied troop
spells.advanced_level: Reanimates ((Power x 50) + 30) health points worth of killed undead creatures in target, allied troop
spells.expert_level: Reanimates ((Power x 50) + 160) health points worth of killed undead creatures in target, allied troop

spells.name: Anti-magic
spells.basic_level: One friendly target unit can only be affected by level 4 or 5 spells
spells.advanced_level: One friendly target unit can only be affected by level 4 or 5 spells
spells.expert_level: One friendly target unit is immune to spell effects

spells.name: Earthquake
spells.basic_level: Does one point of damage to two, random castle walls during siege combat
spells.advanced_level: Does one point of damage to three, random castle walls during siege combat
spells.expert_level: Does one point of damage to four, random castle walls during siege combat

spells.name: Force Field
spells.basic_level: A two hex wide force wall is created at target hex. Movement through these hexes is blocked
spells.advanced_level: Same as Basic effect, except the force wall is three hexes wide

spells.name: Protection From Earth
spells.basic_level: Damage from Earth Magic spells is reduced by 30% for target, allied troop
spells.advanced_level: Damage from Earth Magic spells is reduced by 50% for target, allied troop
spells.expert_level: Damage from Earth Magic spells is reduced by 50% for all allied troops

spells.name: Meteor Shower
spells.basic_level: Troops in target hex and adjacent hexes take ((Power x 25) + 25) damage
spells.advanced_level: Troops in target hex and adjacent hexes take ((Power x 25) + 50) damage
spells.expert_level: Troops in target hex and adjacent hexes take ((Power x 25) + 100) damage

spells.name: Resurrection
spells.basic_level: One friendly target unit with dead creatures has ((Power x 50) + 40) health worth of creatures restored to life for the duration of the current battle
spells.advanced_level: Same as Basic effect, except that ((Power x 50) +80) health worth of creatures are restored permanently
spells.expert_level: Same as Advanced effect, except that (Power x 50 + 160) health worth of creatures are restored

spells.name: Sorrow
spells.basic_level: One enemy targeted unit's morale rating is reduced by one
spells.advanced_level: One enemy targeted unit's morale rating is reduced by two
spells.expert_level: All enemy troops' morale ratings are reduced by two

spells.name: Town Portal
spells.basic_level: Casting hero is teleported to the nearest allied town. 300 movement points are expended when the spell is cast
spells.advanced_level: Casting hero may teleport to any allied town with no visiting hero. 300 movement points are expended when the spell is cast
spells.expert_level: Same as Advanced effect, except that movement point cost is 200

spells.name: Implosion
spells.basic_level: One enemy target unit receives ((Power x 75) + 100) damage
spells.advanced_level: One enemy target unit receives ((Power x 75) + 200) damage
spells.expert_level: One enemy target unit receives ((Power x 75) + 300) damage

spells.name: Summon Earth Elemental
spells.basic_level: A troop containing (Power x 2) earth elementals appears on the side of the casting player. Only one type of elemental can be summoned
spells.advanced_level: Same as Basic effect, except that (Power x 3) earth elementals are summoned
spells.expert_level: Same as Basic effect, except that (Power x 4) earth elementals are summoned
